text:
The Strategy and Innovation team leverages the power of data and analytics to shape strategic decisions at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, a world renowned organization dedicated to the progressive control and cure of cancer through programs of patient care, research, and education.

Our multidisciplinary team of data scientists, operations research engineers, software engineers, business analysts and user interface designers focuses on solving problems that will measurably impact the lives of our patients and staff.

See more at http://careers.mskcc.org/job/5718171/data-scientist-v-analyt...
